## Introduction

The Mappl SaaS Template is your ultimate time-saving solution for building modern SaaS applications. Designed specifically for developers who want to ship faster without compromising on quality, this template provides everything you need to get started in minutes, not weeks. (Save over 100+ hours of development time)

## Features

### Pre-built Components

- **Modern Header**: Responsive navigation with smooth dropdown animations and mobile menu transitions
- **Hero Section**: Dynamic text animations with staggered reveal effects and interactive background elements
- **Bento Grid**: Beautifully animated grid layout with hover effects and on-view reveal animations
- **Pricing Cards**: Interactive pricing tables with hover states and smooth transition effects
- **Testimonials**: 
  - Compact testimonial
  - Full-width testimonial section with parallax scroll effects
- **Call-to-Action**: Engaging CTA section with animated background patterns and hover effects
- **Footer**: Clean, responsive footer with animated social links and smooth transitions
- **Auth Pages**: 
  - Sign Up page with form validation animations
  - Sign In page with smooth transitions and error states
